page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: Our area consists of a large amount of private and council housing on the edge of an industrial area including ICI and BSC.Most of this happening in post 1945.Within is the established community of Dormanstown which was built to house the steel workers of the Dorman Long firm.Our Comprehensive School,Westfields,takes pupils from Dormanstown and most of the housing in the block. The land is very flat and though is on the edge of an industrial belt it does contain 2 farms;the land being rented from Langbaugh Council.Within the housing development there are lots of open spaces,school playing fields and Loche Park.Amenities within the area include 3 shopping centres,a hospital,fire & ambulance stations,6 primary schools,3 secondary schools,a community centre and a clinic.
